title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.2 DÉVELOP. INITIATIVES LOCALES

description.narrative: Output 4.2. D'ici fin 2014, les communautes des zones affectees par les crises developpent des inititaves locales pour assurer la continuite de la scolarisation de leurs enfants., which contributes to Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Skills Development, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. related-activity.ref: 2760/A0/03/018 OUTCOME 4 : EDUCATION DE BASE DE QUALITÉ

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.2. D'ici fin 2014, les communautes des zones affectees par les crises developpent des inititaves locales pour assurer lacontinuite de la scolarisation de leurs enfants.
Nombre de CGS impliques dans le fonctionnement des structures educatives.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 400 structures de gestion scolaire sont appuye dans leur fonctionnement.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. Data not available as evaluation is ongoing. However, by the end of 2014, 3,051 members of 883 School Management Committees were trained on their roles and responsibilities as well as school management at the decentralized level.

title.narrative: Nombre de jeunes enfants beneficiant d'un encadrement les preparant pour l'ecole.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, plus de 6,600 jeunes enfants ont beneficie d'un encadrement les preparant pour l'ecole a travers des activites de stimulation et d'eveil.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 40,000 jeunes enfants beneficient d'un encadrement les preparant pour l'ecole.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, 50,179 young children benefitted from continued access to preschool education through the provision of ECD related activities, based on the Care for Child Development approach, parental education and psycho-cognitive stimulation.

title.narrative: Nombre d'ecole disposant d'un mecanisme fonctionnel de prevention et de referencement de cas de violence.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, un mecanisme fonctionnel de prevention et de referencement des cas de violence est mis en place dans 100 ecoles.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, un mecanisme fonctionnel de prevention et de referencement des cas de violence est mis en place dans 900 ecoles.

actual.value: 2014:Partially Achieved. By the end of 2014, a reference mechanism to prevent violence in school has been put in place in 62 schools in the regions of Sikasso and Gao (Note: Correction of Target: 100 schools instead of 900 schools).
